name: Rotate Hit 3D
description:
Do you like to play a game that will improve your focus and concentration? 

Let's put your focus and concentration to the test. This game will help you focus better in general so you can tackle world-life problems. As the object rotates, you have to hit strategically and that's the puzzle element of this game. It's relaxing and fun. Each time you put a bullet into the object is a satisfying experience. 

The game objective is to reach the highest possible level and hit the rotating objects. Each object has a certain about of hits that it can take, and you have to hit them as much as you can without hitting twice the same spot as the bullets from your shots get stuck into the object. 

As you reach higher levels, the game difficulty increases overtime. 

The game is totally FREE!

Play now!
